title: Using UA Heart Rate with the UA Band | Under Armour HealthBox
description:
In this video, learn how to pair your UA Heart Rate to your UA Band via Bluetooth.

UA HealthBox™ is the world’s first Connected Fitness system, created specifically to measure, monitor, and manage the factors that determine HOW YOU FEEL. UA HealthBox™ tracks and analyzes your sleep, daily activity, the intensity of your workouts, and weight. The UA Record™ app collects all this data into one dashboard showing your progress in real-time.

asset.title: Using UA Heart Rate with the UA Band | Under Armour HealthBox
asset.description:
In this video, learn how to pair your UA Heart Rate to your UA Band via Bluetooth.

For more about UA HealthBox, visit: http://undrarmr.co/1RtqEZK

UA HealthBox™ is the world’s first Connected Fitness system, created specifically to measure, monitor, and manage the factors that determine HOW YOU FEEL. UA HealthBox™ tracks and analyzes your sleep, daily activity, the intensity of your workouts, and weight. The UA Record™ app collects all this data into one dashboard showing your progress in real-time.
asset.author: Under Armour

transcripts: Your ua band and ua heart rate each measure key aspects of your health and fitness when used together during a workout your ua band will automatically connect to your ua heart rate taking workout tracking to a new level now your band is able to display data from your ua heart rate while you're working out including your heart rate calories intensity and willpower you're also able to track your heart rate zones using the indicator light on your band now you're ready to hit your target.
